name: Google Syntax Highlighter Button
author: Kazuki Shibata

sections.description: If you use the plugin “WP-Google Syntax Highlighter”, you should install this plugin. WP-Google Syntax Highlighter is a plugin to highlight code. Our plugin provides a button for WP-Google Syntax Highlighter in TinyMCE editor. So, it becomes easy to use the Google Syntax Highlighter.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory “wp-gsh-button” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Also activate the WP-Google Syntax Highlighter
sections.faq:
Are there the any one necessary for another?

Yes. You also have to install WP-Google Syntax Highlighter.

short_description: This plugin provides a button for WP-Google Syntax Highlighter in TinyMCE editor.
